excerpt: The TMC389 is an integrated 3-phase stepper motor predriver solution for Laboratory Automation, 3D-Printing, Scanners and other automated equipment applications. The device is capable of driving up to a gate current of 40mA and is powered by Trinamic StallGuard2™, CoolStep™, SpreadCycle™, MicroPlyer™ technology. TMC389 is designed for a supply voltage of 9...60V. The device provides a SPI and S/D interface.Special FeaturesCoolStep™StallGuard2™

Quality: Statement concerning RoHS compliance of TMC389
